dashboard.description: Uploaded by https://gitlab.com/gitlab-com/runbooks/-/jobs/1351825277 at Wed Jun 16 12:42:40 UTC 2021

panels.description: Apdex is a measure of requests that complete within a tolerable period of time for the service. Higher is better.

seriesOverrides.alias: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

targets.legendFormat: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

panels.title: pvs Service Apdex

targets.expr:
sum(
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_1h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="pvs"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on () (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_5m{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="pvs"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{monitor="global",type="pvs"})))),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on () (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_1h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="pvs"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{monitor="global",type="pvs"})))),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on () (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_30m{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="pvs"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{monitor="global",type="pvs"})))),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on () (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_6h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="pvs"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{monitor="global",type="pvs"})))),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

panels.description: Error rates are a measure of unhandled service exceptions per second. Client errors are excluded when possible. Lower is better

seriesOverrides.alias: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

targets.legendFormat: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

panels.title: pvs Service Error Ratio

targets.expr:
sum (
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_1h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="pvs"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_5m{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="pvs"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{monitor="global",type="pvs"})),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_1h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="pvs"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{monitor="global",type="pvs"})),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_30m{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="pvs"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{monitor="global",type="pvs"})),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_6h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="pvs"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{monitor="global",type="pvs"})),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

panels.description: The operation rate is the sum total of all requests being handle for all components within this service. Note that a single user request can lead to requests to multiple components. Higher is busier.
panels.title: pvs Service RPS - Requests per Second

panels.description: Saturation is a measure of what ratio of a finite resource is currently being utilized. Lower is better.
panels.title: Saturation

panels.title: http SLI Apdex

targets.expr:
sum(
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_component_apdex:ratio_1h{component="http",env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="pvs"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on () (gitlab_component_apdex:ratio_5m{component="http",env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="pvs"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{monitor="global",type="pvs"})))),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on () (gitlab_component_apdex:ratio_1h{component="http",env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="pvs"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{monitor="global",type="pvs"})))),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on () (gitlab_component_apdex:ratio_30m{component="http",env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="pvs"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{monitor="global",type="pvs"})))),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on () (gitlab_component_apdex:ratio_6h{component="http",env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",stage="$stage",type="pvs"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{monitor="global",type="pvs"})))),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

panels.content:
### Observability Tools

* [Google Cloud Run Console](https://console.cloud.google.com/run/detail/us-central1/pipeline-validation-service/metrics?project=glsec-trust-safety-live)
* [Stackdriver Logs: Cloud Run Access Logs](https://console.cloud.google.com/logs/query;query=resource%2Elabels%2Eservice%5Fname%3D%22pipeline%2Dvalidation%2Dservice%22%0Aresource%2Etype%3D%22cloud%5Frun%5Frevision%22;timeRange=PT30M?project=glsec-trust-safety-live)
* [Stackdriver Logs: Cloud Run Access 5xx Logs](https://console.cloud.google.com/logs/query;query=httpRequest%2Estatus%3E%3D500%0Aresource%2Elabels%2Eservice%5Fname%3D%22pipeline%2Dvalidation%2Dservice%22%0Aresource%2Etype%3D%22cloud%5Frun%5Frevision%22;timeRange=PT30M?project=glsec-trust-safety-live)
* [üìñ Kibana: PVS logs](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/discover?_a=(columns:!(json.jsonPayload.mode,json.jsonPayload.validation_status,json.jsonPayload.project_id,json.jsonPayload.correation_id,json.jsonPayload.msg),filters:!(),index:'4858f3a0-a312-11eb-966b-2361593353f9')&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [üìñ Kibana: PVS failed request logs](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/discover?_a=(columns:!(json.jsonPayload.mode,json.jsonPayload.validation_status,json.jsonPayload.project_id,json.jsonPayload.correation_id,json.jsonPayload.msg),filters:!((query:(range:(json.jsonPayload.status_code:(gte:500))))),index:'4858f3a0-a312-11eb-966b-2361593353f9')&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [üìà Kibana: PVS requests](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/visualize/create?type=line&indexPattern=4858f3a0-a312-11eb-966b-2361593353f9&_a=(filters:!(),query:(language:kuery,query:''),vis:(aggs:!((enabled:!t,id:'1',params:(),schema:metric,type:count),(enabled:!t,id:'2',params:(drop_partials:!t,extended_bounds:(),field:json.timestamp,interval:auto,min_doc_count:1,scaleMetricValues:!f,timeRange:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}'),useNormalizedEsInterval:!t),schema:segment,type:date_histogram))))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [üìà Kibana: PVS failed requests](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/visualize/create?type=line&indexPattern=4858f3a0-a312-11eb-966b-2361593353f9&_a=(filters:!((query:(range:(json.jsonPayload.status_code:(gte:500))))),query:(language:kuery,query:''),vis:(aggs:!((enabled:!t,id:'1',params:(),schema:metric,type:count),(enabled:!t,id:'2',params:(drop_partials:!t,extended_bounds:(),field:json.timestamp,interval:auto,min_doc_count:1,scaleMetricValues:!f,timeRange:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}'),useNormalizedEsInterval:!t),schema:segment,type:date_histogram))))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [üìà Kibana: PVS sum latency aggregated](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/visualize/create?type=line&indexPattern=4858f3a0-a312-11eb-966b-2361593353f9&_a=(filters:!(),query:(language:kuery,query:''),vis:(aggs:!((enabled:!t,id:'1',params:(field:json.jsonPayload.duration_ms),schema:metric,type:sum),(enabled:!t,id:'2',params:(drop_partials:!t,extended_bounds:(),field:json.timestamp,interval:auto,min_doc_count:1,scaleMetricValues:!f,timeRange:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}'),useNormalizedEsInterval:!t),schema:segment,type:date_histogram),(enabled:!t,id:'3',params:(field:json.jsonPayload.validation_status.keyword,missingBucket:!f,missingBucketLabel:Missing,order:desc,orderBy:'1',otherBucket:!t,otherBucketLabel:Other,size:5),schema:group,type:terms)),params:(valueAxes:!((id:'ValueAxis-1',name:'LeftAxis-1',position:left,scale:(mode:normal,type:linear),show:!t,style:(),title:(text:'Sum+Request+Duration:+json.jsonPayload.duration_ms'),type:value)))))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [üìà Kibana: PVS sum latency aggregated (split)](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/visualize/create?type=line&indexPattern=4858f3a0-a312-11eb-966b-2361593353f9&_a=(filters:!(),query:(language:kuery,query:''),vis:(aggs:!((enabled:!t,id:'1',params:(field:json.jsonPayload.duration_ms),schema:metric,type:sum),(enabled:!t,id:'2',params:(drop_partials:!t,extended_bounds:(),field:json.timestamp,interval:auto,min_doc_count:1,scaleMetricValues:!f,timeRange:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}'),useNormalizedEsInterval:!t),schema:segment,type:date_histogram),(enabled:!t,id:'3',params:(field:json.jsonPayload.validation_status.keyword,missingBucket:!f,missingBucketLabel:Missing,order:desc,orderBy:'1',otherBucket:!t,otherBucketLabel:Other,size:5),schema:group,type:terms)),params:(valueAxes:!((id:'ValueAxis-1',name:'LeftAxis-1',position:left,scale:(mode:normal,type:linear),show:!t,style:(),title:(text:'Sum+Request+Duration:+json.jsonPayload.duration_ms'),type:value)))))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [üìà Kibana: PVS percentile latency aggregated](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/visualize/create?type=line&indexPattern=4858f3a0-a312-11eb-966b-2361593353f9&_a=(filters:!(),query:(language:kuery,query:''),vis:(aggs:!((enabled:!t,id:'1',params:(field:json.jsonPayload.duration_ms,percents:!(95)),schema:metric,type:percentiles),(enabled:!t,id:'2',params:(drop_partials:!t,extended_bounds:(),field:json.timestamp,interval:auto,min_doc_count:1,scaleMetricValues:!f,timeRange:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}'),useNormalizedEsInterval:!t),schema:segment,type:date_histogram)),params:(valueAxes:!((id:'ValueAxis-1',name:'LeftAxis-1',position:left,scale:(mode:normal,type:linear),show:!t,style:(),title:(text:'p95+Request+Duration:+json.jsonPayload.duration_ms'),type:value)))))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
* [üìà Kibana: PVS percentile latency aggregated (split)](https://log.gprd.gitlab.net/app/kibana#/visualize/create?type=line&indexPattern=4858f3a0-a312-11eb-966b-2361593353f9&_a=(filters:!(),query:(language:kuery,query:''),vis:(aggs:!((enabled:!t,id:'1',params:(field:json.jsonPayload.duration_ms,percents:!(95)),schema:metric,type:percentiles),(enabled:!t,id:'2',params:(drop_partials:!t,extended_bounds:(),field:json.timestamp,interval:auto,min_doc_count:1,scaleMetricValues:!f,timeRange:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}'),useNormalizedEsInterval:!t),schema:segment,type:date_histogram),(enabled:!t,id:'3',params:(field:json.jsonPayload.validation_status.keyword,missingBucket:!f,missingBucketLabel:Missing,order:desc,orderAgg:(enabled:!t,id:'3-orderAgg',params:(field:json.jsonPayload.duration_ms),schema:orderAgg,type:sum),orderBy:custom,otherBucket:!t,otherBucketLabel:Other,size:5),schema:group,type:terms)),params:(valueAxes:!((id:'ValueAxis-1',name:'LeftAxis-1',position:left,scale:(mode:normal,type:linear),show:!t,style:(),title:(text:'p95+Request+Duration:+json.jsonPayload.duration_ms'),type:value)))))&_g=(time:(from:'${__from:date:iso}',to:'${__to:date:iso}')))
panels.title: Details
Estimated p95 http Latency - per response_code
Apdex attribution for http Latency - per response_code

panels.description:
Open file descriptor utilization per instance.

Saturation on file descriptor limits may indicate a resource-descriptor leak in the application.

As a temporary fix, you may want to consider restarting the affected process.
 Lower is better.
panels.title: open_fds component saturation: Open file descriptor utilization per instance

panels.description:
Cloud Run is configured with a maximum number of container instances. When this is saturated, Google Cloud Run
will no longer scale up.

More information available at https://cloud.google.com/run/docs/configuring/max-instances.
 Lower is better.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(
  clamp_max(
    max by(environment, state) (
  clamp_min(
    clamp_max(
      sum by (environment, state) (
        stackdriver_cloud_run_revision_run_googleapis_com_container_instance_count{
          configuration_name="pipeline-validation-service",
          env="$environment",environment="$environment"
        }
      )
      /
      100
      ,
      1)
  ,
  0)
)

  ,1)
,0)

panels.title: pvs_cloudrun_container_instances component saturation: Cloud Run Container Instance Utilization
Rejected requests as a percentage of all requests
